name: Battle-Cattle for iOS/Android (Canceled)
blurb: Battle Cattle features a new Launcher-Defense style of gameplay. Borrowing heavily from Missile Command, Angry Birds and Tower Defense.

rewards.reward: For those that part with 3 of their hard earned monies: You will receive the full game + in-game rewards to spend on the shiniest, smelliest and deadliest upgrades/customizations! Get that extra boost from the start and quickly outpace your friends!
All backers who pledge 6 or more monies receive access to our forums to vote on decisions regarding the design of the game! (Plus previous reward)

Part with 10 monies to receive: An 8"x11" official "I made this happen" Poster Print signed by the games Designer. Prove to your friends that you helped contribute to the games industry! Backers can vote on the posters design on our forums! (Plus previous rewards) US please add \u00a32.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a33.00 s/h

Part with a whopping chunk of 25 monies to receive: A mug with the level art of your choice! (Plus game/reward + Poster + Forum)\r\nUS please add \u00a35.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a37.00 s/h

Those wishing to pledge 50 monies will receive: A symbolic pat on the back by means of heartfelt thanks in the credits, forever solidifying your place in video games history! (Plus game/reward + Poster + Forum + Mug)\r\nUS please add \u00a35.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a37.00 s/h

Pledge 80 monies and you recieve: A caricature of yourself in the credits! Send us a photo and we will immortalize you in our game! (Plus game/reward + Poster + Mug + In game thanks)\r\nUS please add \u00a35.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a37.00 s/h

Imaginative individuals who pledge 120 monies receieve: One-on-One time with the games designer or artist to design your very own Enemy Unit. That's right, design your own enemy character and then destroy him in the game! (Plus game/reward + Poster + Forum + Mug + In game thanks) US please add \u00a35.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a37.00 s/h

Got too much money? Get rid of 125 filthy pieces of it and receive: One-on-One time with the games designer or artist to design your very own Boss. This boss will be named after you or a name of your choosing. (does not include the previous design-your-own-enemy reward as we have to limit quantities) (Plus game/reward + Poster + Forum + Mug + In game thanks)\r\nUS please add \u00a35.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a37.00 s/h

Just won the lottery? Pledge 150 monies to receive: One-on-One time with the games designer or artist to design your very own level environment. (does not include the previous design-your-own-enemy or boss rewards as we have to limit quantities) (Plus game/reward + Poster + Forum + Mug + In game thanks)\r\nUS please add \u00a35.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a37.00 s/h

Collectors who pledge 150 monies will receive a one-of-a-kind, full-page concept sketch from our artist, signed and dated. We have 10 full size sketches: Title Screen, Home area, Upgrade area, Lab Area, and 6 different sets of enemies/bosses!\r\n(Plus game/reward + Poster + Forum + Mug + In game thanks) US please add \u00a310.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a314.00 s/h

If you are a rich Nigerian prince, feel free to pledge 200 monies to receive: A caricature of yourself illustrated by the games artist placed into the story as a major character. Must supply a photo of yourself with a short bio. (Plus game/reward + Poster + Forum + Mug + In game thanks) US please add \u00a35.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a37.00 s/h

Game developers who pledge 200 monies will get their game or app featured in our game! (Plus game/reward + Poster + Forum + Mug + In game thanks) US please add \u00a35.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a37.00 s/h

Online Business Owners who pledge 350 monies will get their store or service advertised in our free version between levels! (Must supply own advertisement art) (Plus game/reward + Poster + Forum + Mug + In game thanks) US please add \u00a35.00 s/h UK and International please add \u00a37.00 s/h
